Sky Sports News understand Inter Milan will try to sign Romelu Lukaku and Victor Moses this summer.

Antonio Conte will officially be named as the new manager next week and we’re told the profiles of Lukaku and Moses fit with his preferred style of play.

Conte tried to bring Lukaku back to Chelsea from Everton but he chose Manchester United instead of a return to Stamford Bridge.

The Belgium international has previously spoken of his admiration for Serie A and expressed a desire to play there.
